About the Company: Raj Oil Mills Ltd started with the production of mustard oil. The organization, since then, has brought into the market a number of quality products and enjoyed the trust of millions of consumers. Raj Oil Mills continues to remain a landmark organization for both their employees and dedicated customers.The product range of the company includes Cocoraj Coconut Oil,Cocoraj Cool Ayurvedic Oil,Guinea Filtered Groundnut Oil,Guinea Lite Refined Groundnut oil,Guinea Lite Refined Sunflower Oil,Tilraj Til Oil,Mustaraj Mustard Oil,Guinea Lite Refined Cottonseed Oil and Guinea Lite Refined Soyabean Oil.
